title: 奶茶店点单
situation: You're at a bubble tea shop. Order your drink.

turns.speaker: partner
turns.pinyin: Nín hǎo, qǐngwèn yào hē shénme?
turns.translation: Hello, what would you like to drink?

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: 我要一杯珍珠奶茶，少冰。
turns.pinyin: Wǒ yào yī bēi zhēnzhū nǎichá, shǎo bīng.
turns.translation: I'd like a pearl milk tea, less ice.
suggestions: 我要一杯珍珠奶茶，少冰。

turns.speaker: partner
turns.text: 好的，糖度呢？正常糖还是少糖？
turns.pinyin: Hǎo de, tángdù ne? Zhèngcháng táng háishì shǎo táng?
turns.translation: Sure, sugar level? Regular or less sugar?
